newsitem.title: USA: Roy F. Weston names acting CEO, chairman.
newsitem.headline: Roy F. Weston names acting CEO, chairman.

text.p: Roy F Weston Inc on Friday named Wiliam Robertson acting president and chief executive and named Thomas Harvey as acting chairman.
On Thursday the company said William Marrazzo had resigned as its president and chief executive, along with its chief financial officer and chief operating officer.
The company said its board has begun the process of permanently filling the positions.
Weston, an international environmental services firm, said Robertson is chairman of Global Exchange Inc, a Virginia-based software development firm.
It said Harvey is chairman of the Global Environment & Technology Foundation and is head of corporate business development for a Washington-based strategic marketing consulting group.
